title: "Battery may run out earlier than usual"
content:
I've had my Google pixel 5 for 2 months and the battery section on settings now says "Battery may run out earlier than usual". The only "heavy use" I use is watching games on Twitch, but that's maybe for an hour every few days?
I've turned my Bluetooth off. 
I don't have many apps installed. 
Dark mode is enabled. 
I use a genuine charger. 

I've read the Google help page on Battery drainage but can't identify the issue. 
Please could someone help me?

Many thanks
